name: Naughty College 18+
description:
Welcome to the world of Naughty College 18+ - an immersive visual novel for adults that will take you on an unforgettable journey of sensuality and forbidden desire.



In this game, you will witness the unique story of a young university professor who unintentionally becomes not only a mentor but also the object of passionate love for three seductive students.

You will witness a delicate balance between academia and sexual energy, as the main character must navigate his professional duties while being enticed by the fiery emotions gradually emerging among these alluring young women.



The beauty and innocence of the students weave intricate webs of challenge and temptation, stirring the hearts within the professor. Each of the students presents her own unique way of capturing his heart, revealing vibrant aspects of their personalities.

In this captivating and erotic world of Naughty College 18+, you can expect an unpredictable plot, stunning visuals, and decisions that will shape the development of the relationships between the characters. Succumb to temptation and help these eager students explore their true feelings in a thrilling realm of forbidden love.

Features:
  • A fascinating story
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Minigames
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
